roleset.name: apply electricity to, excite
roleset.note: ELECTRIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'electrify' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, which is only the metaphorical usage. (from electrify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: Readers-1 were electrified [*-1] by the paper's audacity and appalled by the dark side of life it uncovered.
